Name: Summer~Life in the Countryside~
About the game: An simulation game about reuniting with your childhood friend, and spending your summer vacation having her. She doesn't talk much, but she's full of curiosity. Let's spend a special summer with her in the countryside. point ・ You can go to various places with her. ・ You can have various conversations with her. ・ You can enjoy the atmosphere of the Japanese countryside.
